column5: Thank you. My English may not be the best but I really like to tell people how happy their work makes me. Thank you very much for your comment ;u; have a nice day!

That sounds really cute and awesome. I'm sure whoever that person is really loves your work <3
Hope you keep getting those nice comments!

No, no, not at all, I think I know what you mean and I totally agree. It better to share the good things (thoughts? Feedback? I canâ€™t find the right word, sorry) rather than the bad, most importantly if itâ€™s about someoneâ€™s work, in this case a fanfic. Thank you very much for sharing your thoughts, have a nice day :]

Thank you for today :)
